ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then closer to you and closer still.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: again, it is worthy of you, altogether worthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Again your ruin has come close, still closer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Again, woe to you! And then woe to you!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Again (consider how) nearer to you and nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then nearer to thee and nearer!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Again nearer unto thee and nearer (is the doom).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Again, woe to you, [O man!], yes, woe to you!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Again, woe to you! Woe to you!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Again, Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Again, woe to you [O man (disbeliever)]! And then (again) woe to you!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then nearer to you and nearer!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then again: Woe to you; and woe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then woe to you, and woe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:35] then [may woe be] nearer to you and nearer! — [repeated] for emphasis.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Again nearer unto thee and nearer (is the doom)) beware, Abu Jahl.
